00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 void pizKohonenMapSetRange (PIZKohonenMap *x, long n)
00047 {
00048     x->range = MAX (n, 1);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void pizKohonenMapSetTraining (PIZKohonenMap *x, long n)
00052 {
00053     x->training = MAX (n, 1);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void pizKohonenMapSetStep (PIZKohonenMap *x, double f)
00057 {
00058     if (f > 0.) {
00059             x->step = f;
00060         }
00061 }
00062 
00063 long pizKohonenMapRange (const PIZKohonenMap *x)
00064 {
00065     return (x->range);
00066 }
00067 
00068 long pizKohonenMapTraining (const PIZKohonenMap *x)
00069 {
00070     return (x->training);
00071 }
00072 
00073 double pizKohonenMapStep (const PIZKohonenMap *x)
00074 {
00075     return (x->step);
00076 }

00078 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 
00081 PIZError pizKohonenMapEncodeToArray (const PIZKohonenMap *x, long n, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00082 {
00083     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00084     
00085     if ((n >= 0) && (n < x->mapSize) && a) {
00086         long i;
00087         
00088         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00089         
00090         for (i = 0; i < x->vectorSize; i++) {
00091             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, (long)(((*(x->map + (n * x->vectorSize) + i)) + 0.5)));
00092         }
00093     }
00094     
00095     return err;
00096 }
